environment.title: Environment name
environment.description: If provided, the Version deployed to this Environment is used. If not provided, the Version deployed to the default Environment is used.

anyOf.title: FileId
anyOf.description: Specification of a File by its ID.

environment.title: Environment name
environment.description: If provided, the Version deployed to this Environment is used. If not provided, the Version deployed to the default Environment is used.

path.title: File path
path.description: Path identifying a File. Provide this to specify a File.

anyOf.title: FilePath
anyOf.description: Specification of a File by its path.

dataset.title: Dataset
dataset.description: Dataset to use in this Run.

environment.title: Environment name
environment.description: If provided, the Version deployed to this Environment is used. If not provided, the Version deployed to the default Environment is used.

anyOf.title: FileId
anyOf.description: Specification of a File by its ID.

environment.title: Environment name
environment.description: If provided, the Version deployed to this Environment is used. If not provided, the Version deployed to the default Environment is used.

path.title: File path
path.description: Path identifying a File. Provide this to specify a File.

anyOf.title: FilePath
anyOf.description: Specification of a File by its path.

version.title: Version
version.description: Version to use in this Run.

orchestrated.title: Humanloop Orchestrated
orchestrated.description: Whether the Run is orchestrated by Humanloop. If `True`, Humanloop will generate Logs for the Run; `dataset` and `version` must be provided. If `False`, a log for the Prompt/Tool should be submitted by the user via the API.

use_existing_logs.title: Use existing Logs
use_existing_logs.description: If `True`, the Run will be initialized with existing Logs associated with the Dataset and Version. If `False`, the Run will be initialized with no Logs. Can only be set to `True` when both `dataset` and `version` are provided.
